OOC:  Hey, Dewboy have you ever read the rules.  Have you ever read 
this one: Do not go vast distances in one post. If you're going from 
South Africa to Europe, post your char leaving, and in about half a 
day or so, post him/her arriving.  Also he was injured so you never 
posted him flying in that general direction.

system
